summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3129 for the improvement of Baker Avenue, from a connection with the existing sewer at West Forty-second Street to West Forty-fifth Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 38230, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
